landing.bio: A proactive and strong communication skills 4th year IT student of OAMK with growing experiences of web and mobile development. Looking for oppotunity as trainee position to leverage my ICT knowledge as well as fulfilling my practical training studies.

experience.aboutWork: Participants joining DevLab to learn how to incubated ideas, designed and developed solutions as an entrepreneur in a multidisciplinary and multicutural environment.

Working as TA is responsile for class management, including paper work and preparing teaching equipment, as well as assist teachers in lessons and learning activities with students. Especially, pay attettion to study progress and lesson progress of each class and each student.

projects.name: REMY
projects.description: A mobile application of which idea and prototype incubated in OAMK DevLab helps families manage their inventory storage and keep track expiration date to prevent food waste in household.

awards.awardDetail: Connect with Finland project by KILKAS
